snippet: MICHEL--Ernest W. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage - A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Trustee Emeritus and Holocaust survivor Ernest Michel. Ernie was a remarkable man who devoted his life to the Jewish community as a whole and the survivor community in particular. He was a great supporter of our Museum and a devoted Trustee. His vision and counsel will be deeply missed. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman Elissa Schein, Deputy Dir. 1/3
